title: Bad Science: A Brief History of Bizarre Misconceptions ...
description:
Bad Science: A Brief History of Bizarre Misconceptions, Totally Wrong Conclusions and Incredibly Stupid Theories - Linda Zimmermann [epub]

011 Silver Medal Winner for Humor, from the Independent Publisher's Awards

Bad Science takes a humorous look at bloodletting, alchemy, quack devices, the worship of meteorites, faked data, secret testing on people, and all kinds of really ridiculous ideas. From the ancient Greeks to the present, the history of science has been fraught with persecution, fraud, and ignorance on a massive scale - but that doesn't mean we can't laugh about it
